{{codepointer|r=Hexen}} '''A_SorcFX1Seek'''
(''no parameter'')
Seeks the target with a threshold of 2 degrees and a max turn of 6 degrees. Also essentially calls [[A_BounceCheck]] only it will play the sound "SorcererHeadScream". This codepointer is restricted to {{Class|SorcFX1}} and derived classes.
